about_the_game:
Explore the strange events that occurred in the Fog City,
5 chapters will be phased release.

*DEMO only has the first chapter

Chapter 1: Dinner

The story of the new night guard and the watchdog working in the cemetery, and there seems to be a little more uninvited guests tonight.
(Chapter completed)

Chapter 2: Crying

The traveler lost his way in the fog, so he took refuge in a resident's house, and he heard crying from the basement.
(Chapter in preparation)

Chapter 3: Gift

There is crazy fog outside the hospital on the mountain, and you must never go out after nightfall.
(Chapter in preparation)

Chapter 4: Secret

The doctor specializes in helping the police understand the details of the murder, and he has a special patient.
(Chapter is in preparation)

Chapter 5: Fiend

The ferry is approaching its destination. Unfortunately, an accident has taken place.
(Chapter is in preparation)


(If the game has any BUG, please report it to us.)

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains violence, bloody scenes, cult elements, the performance of humans and monsters being killed, and corpses. All content is presented in low-pixel images.

name: DEEP FOG 霧城 Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 Professional
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-3210M CPU @ 2.50GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 610M
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: store in SSD is well
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 Professional
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-3210M CPU @ 2.50GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 610M
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: store in SSD is well
